Certainly! Here are some tips on how to use oatmeal as an exfoliator:

1. Begin with dry, clean skin. You can wash your face with your regular cleanser before exfoliating. 2. Place 1-2 tablespoons of oatmeal in your palm and add enough water to create a paste. You can use milk or honey instead of water to add extra nourishment. 3. Apply the paste to your face and massage gently in circular motions. Avoid the eye area. 4. Let the oatmeal sit on your face for 5-10 minutes. This will allow the nourishing properties of the oats to sink in and work their magic. 5. Rinse the oatmeal off with warm water, pat your face dry with a clean towel, and apply moisturizer to seal in the hydration. 6. Use this exfoliating treatment once a week or as needed, based on your skin's needs. It's essential to remember that when you're exfoliating, gentle is always better, especially if you have dry, sensitive skin. You can also adjust the amount of oatmeal and water you use to create a consistency that works for you.
